website_summaries.verdict: Quality stainless steel construction and 11 different functions make this multi-tool one of the best in its price range.
pros: Includes wrenches, rulers, knife, bottle opener, and saw blade
Quality construction that won't bend or dull quickly
cons: Some parts of the tool are sharp and could cut you if you're not careful

customer_reviews.title: Does it hurt your hand when u use it? DO THIS!!
customer_reviews.text: It comes with the sheath, USE IT! Now that being said you can not use the sheath for every function, but the cutting,prying and driving functions you can. It's not a flawed tool,it's FLAWED USERS. Also it works great for a fire steal striker!!!
customer_reviews.author: Josh w.

customer_reviews.title: Great but not safe. Needs a case
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as described. Very useful. My only complaint is that I wish it came with some sort of case so that the sharper parts weren’t exposed. The sharp bits can easily cut holes in your bag or slice your hand when you’re rummaging through it. And if it’s on the keychain, that opens a safety concern for OTHER people as well. I think that this product should definitely come with a case
customer_reviews.author: Ari

customer_reviews.title: Bad chemicals
customer_reviews.text: See attached photo for Prop 65 warning that manufacturer was kind enough to include on the shipped item. While I do appreciate it, I’d have appreciated it even more if this info would’ve been listed on the product page itself. I’ll be returning without opening so I can’t speak to its effectiveness.
customer_reviews.author: Molpadia

customer_reviews.title: Good gift/stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Bought one for my father and one for my husband for Christmas. They used them to help open the packages on all the other gifts. They especially came in handy cutting all of the kid’s gifts out of their packages. They both seemed to like that they fit well in their wallets. My dad really liked the compas feature. I thought they looked like good quality multi tools.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hidden gem
customer_reviews.text: My son received one when he entered college, and made sure to rub it in our faces when we scrambled for a bottle opener, etc. well I bought two for myself and my other son. These are identical, except... they are better quality! The blade is sharper, the tooling is superior, and it fits in your wallet like a credit card. A neat little item to have.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: My husband said it was a hazard and threw it away
customer_reviews.text: I bought it as a stocking stuffer for my father in law. The blade on the side was very sharp and had cut through the sleeve it came in. I asked my husband what he thought I should do and he wrapped it in duct tape and threw it in the garbage. Said it was too dangerous as a pocket tool. 2 stars for sharpness!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Broken
customer_reviews.text: So upset! Purchased this for my husband for Christmas and it showed up broken and taped together. Who would send out a product like that? It’s literally taped together with clear tape. Wouldn’t recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good card, small sleeve
customer_reviews.text: The card at built pretty nice but the “leather” cover isn’t the right size. Mine came small and wrinkled. It is very hard to get the card in and out of the sleeve without cutting yourself on a sharp side of the card because the protective sleeve is small.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn Jessen-Smith

customer_reviews.title: A Keeper!
customer_reviews.text: I have two other credit card tools from other makers that are almost 10 times more expensive than this one and this is the one I always carry and like the most. Get this one. It has more functionality and usefulness than the others IMHO. The sharpened edges are what sets this one apart from the rest. It comes with a little pouch so the exposed edges are not a real problem when carrying. I have used most of the tool features on this card tool and would not hesitate at all in buying it again. A winner.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walters

customer_reviews.title: 11 in 1 isn't exactly true
customer_reviews.text: I like it's compact size and sturdiness. It was a fair price. 11 functions is not exactly true however. The compass function is a joke. I didn't buy it for the compass feature anyway. I just think it should do as advertised however. If we wanted to call it a "10 in 1 wallet survival tool" then I would give this a perfect score.
customer_reviews.author: RD Leedy

customer_reviews.title: Probably works but looks so cheap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a stocking stuffer for my outdoorsman father, thinking he could easily keep it in his wallet. It was so cheap looking that I refused to wrap it and gave it to him a few days later, admitting I was disappointed in the quality and wouldn't be offended if he tossed it. A waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: KPTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Easy wallet fit, comfortable, and useful
customer_reviews.text: I don't use this often but when I do everyone wants to give it a go. All my friends love this and I mainly use it when I get a little drunk and don't have a bottle opener. Rarely I have had to use the knife but one day I had to cut some fishing string. So far its worked out pretty great and doesn't pester me at all when it is in my wallet. highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kris Lanham

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget. Very useful.
customer_reviews.text: I'm looking to buy more and will do so next time I get something. Overall, it seems to work exactly as expected. I have something similar and it has already proven useful as more than just a bottle opener so kudos for this awesome gadget. The ruler is a great touch.
customer_reviews.author: H.G.

customer_reviews.title: had such a lot of fun using their new pocket tool
customer_reviews.text: In their stockings , our son & spouse plus nephews & another young spouse, had such a lot of fun using their new pocket tool! It was a great time. Since the knife part is quite sharp, it was good that they came in a little pouch.This was the best & most fun thing in the Christmas stockings, but would also make a great addition in a care package for college kids, etc.
customer_reviews.author: KWL

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift and TOTALLY worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a fun little gift to put in my husband's Easter Basket more thinking he would find it funny v. useful - but he LOVED it! So much he has shown EVERYONE! And wants to buy these as stocking stuffers for all of his friends! The size is perfect to fit in a wallet and is very sturdy with a pretty sharp knife. TOTALLY worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Jackattack

customer_reviews.title: Good tool, just ok cover
customer_reviews.text: Great stocking stuffer for men and women. The pouch is nice to protect your wallet or purse, and to hide the sharp edges, but it seems like it may tear easily. The tools included all are useful.
customer_reviews.author: J. Antosz

customer_reviews.title: Nice accessory
customer_reviews.text: I liked mine so much I bought my friend one! Great for our trips as long as we don't go on a plane because you forget to take them out of your wallet! That's a no-no and fortunately, we remembered to put them in checked baggage. Used them a lot. We call them our McGyver tool!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Meinel

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected, and rough finish
customer_reviews.text: I was a little disappointed with this item...it was smaller than I expected, I thought it would be credit card size, that I could store in my wallet...can do, but much smaller than cc size, and rough edges, a little dangerous. OK just not as expected...
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool that fits well in a wallet
customer_reviews.text: While I was sort of hoping I could put the tool in my wallet without the black holder it comes in, it's much better to keep it in there due to the sharp edge of the card and for the instructions on where to find each tool. It additionally fits well in the wallet and is very sturdy and feels like it's not going to break with use. Glad I bought one!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Love this in my wallet
customer_reviews.text: Love this in my wallet. Small enough to fit in a credit card slot. It came with a little leather pouch to hole it so I keep it in there and stick it inside my wallet in a slot that hides behind where the credit cards go. Used it to open a beer bottle once at this one party a few weeks ago and some dudes came out of nowhere asking where they can get one.
customer_reviews.author: Ry Tehomes

customer_reviews.title: Seems pretty handy
customer_reviews.text: Seems pretty handy but doesn't have as much on there as I thought it did so I don't know how long my husband will be carrying it around but for the price, I can't complain. At the very least the warning label on the back cracked me up so its all good!
customer_reviews.author: crys_w56

customer_reviews.title: It's a neat bottle opener. The rest is just ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a neat bottle opener. The rest is just novelty. Got it for a stocking stuffer for Christmas. All the other functions might actually work but it would tear up your hand trying to use it.
customer_reviews.author: A Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant purchase
customer_reviews.text: Saw this on a different website, bought from Amazon because it was cheaper. Always wanted one, just in case. Comes in little pouch, excited for the opportunity when I actually get to use it.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: Handy tool
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little tool that I can keep with me in any situation. I work in retail where we are constantly losing boxcutters but we also can't bring in knives so this is perfect; I can keep this with me at work without being written up for carrying a weapon. The bottle opener works easily on every bottle Ive used it on. The screwdriver is probably the tool I forget the most about but also is the most handy.
customer_reviews.author: Anglophile

customer_reviews.title: Not credit card size
customer_reviews.text: Good $4 value for this steel multi-tool. It is smaller than a credit card and I'm not sure why that description is used. Maybe there were other versions that were that size but not this one. If you have large hands it may be hard to hold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more for the branded ones
customer_reviews.text: The leather it came with can't be used. It's really bad quality. The product itself is a little bulky than the name brand ones. Smaller than others and heavier too.
customer_reviews.author: Mik

customer_reviews.title: Too small and too dangerous
customer_reviews.text: Well was going to Givec16 grandson very Small very Danger Because he does Boy Scouts but this is too small and too dangerous
customer_reviews.author: snowkiwi

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little gadget. Everyone should keep one in their purse or wallet. Had gotten me out of trouble a few times. Have purchased them for friends as gifts too.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great for everyone in any situation!
customer_reviews.text: This little thing does it all! I originally got this for my fiancé as a little extra something to open for his birthday. I ended up loving it so much, I keep an extra in my purse! Have one for the car, one for work, you’ll never know when you’ll need a multi-tool and it’s so conveniently small!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, good stocking stuffer.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little smaller than a credit card. It comes with a small instruction card (what everything does, how to use the compass), and a little plastic-y sleeve, which was all crumpled and wrinkled. Easily fixed by putting the sleeve in some hot water for half a minute.
customer_reviews.author: Isabella Grae

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for all the men at Christmas as a little stocking stuffer. My husband uses his & everyone seemed to like them. I wish they had a better way to hold though- sharp at times.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap backup tool
customer_reviews.text: No instructions on how to use some things on it. Case is really janky. For 4.99 I guess it’s a good wallet backup.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Reece

customer_reviews.title: A few things to know...
customer_reviews.text: So it's a little heavy-- which is either a sign of quality and/or a weight in the wallet. Probably will keep in glove box. Very sharp blade-- good, but scary. This product will probably get confiscated by airport security, FYI. Maybe a little more info on the insert would be nice. No real problem, just these thoughts.
customer_reviews.author: Butterflies and Light

customer_reviews.title: Great and practical!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome tool, comes in sleeve both small enough for a wallet! The saw is sharp, the other tools and uses are accurate and function easily with the card that explains the uses! I got them for gifts for the boys in my family this year and they loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Just get one. You'll use it.
customer_reviews.text: This has come in handy time and time again. I love this little thing, and I don't even notice it in my wallet. The razor blade is nice and sharp, and at least on my wallet, I don't have to worry about it poking out and cutting me, since it sinks in deep enough. However, even though it does sink in, it is not difficult to remove. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my husband as a stocking stuffer. He likes it and uses it but says it sets off metal detectors and he forgets that sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Useful and high quality. I got one for myself and liked it well and enough to get one for my brother.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Trogdon

customer_reviews.title: DON’T FALL FOR THIS
customer_reviews.text: RIDICULOUS THING,,,SO SMALL...HURTS YOUR HANDS....USELESS. I PUT IT IN THE DONATION BAG.
customer_reviews.author: Vilma Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good metal
customer_reviews.text: I was raised to always be prepared because “I was an egale scout” And so the tools this has along with the quality of metal and durability seems quite good. Especially for the price
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: He loves it
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a stocking stuffer for my husband and he loves it. He was so excited. Great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Nezzy

customer_reviews.title: Hubby looooves it!
customer_reviews.text: This was a simple gift to my husband. It turned out to be so much more than simple. He does everything with it, from carpentry to a bottle opener. Very handy, durable and reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Multifunctional
customer_reviews.text: Fun and creative gifts that family enjoyed. Multipurpose tool that works!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Pavlovich

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: If you don't carry a pocket knife, but want a multi-purpose tool to have with you, this is the product for you! It easily fits in your wallet, so you don't have a bulky pocket knife to worry about.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-tool
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband for Christmas, he has used this a couple of times and love it. Its durable and fits perfectly in his wallet. Its very handy when you are on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Syks

customer_reviews.title: My husband says so.
customer_reviews.text: My husband says it's great. So its great. You can trust him. I do.
customer_reviews.author: LadyStanleyCup

customer_reviews.title: Really cant complain
customer_reviews.text: bought it as an extra a few months ago. I have never had a chance to really use it but will admit there are probably better products out there.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lafrenaye

customer_reviews.title: Trust the reviews!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE/ I usually wear a 2x and bought this smaller. I could have gone another size smaller. Perfect coat. Love the fabric, the style and the room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The edges need to be filed down
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and function, but every edge is sharp making it hard to hold only. Every edge needs to be filed or sanded to keep from accidentally cutting yourself.
customer_reviews.author: kelsey m

customer_reviews.title: Best gadget
customer_reviews.text: Great little gift for the guy who has all the tools!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R. Merrill

customer_reviews.title: Handy for many uses!
customer_reviews.text: Great stocking stuffers. Took forever to get here (as advertised it would), but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: GSmith

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great tool, hate the plastic sleeve, makes it look cheap, but the tool itself is a good buy.,
customer_reviews.author: Arlis Steele

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend received this as a stocking stuffer for christmas and loves it. Such good, high quality and fits in his pocket nicely :)
customer_reviews.author: Carson Berglund

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in terrible condition
customer_reviews.text: The leather case in which the tools comes in, arrived damaged and rugged. It looks terrible. Please take that into consideration before buying. According to other reviews, this tend to happen a lot with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Trejo

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: Gave it to my dad as a Christmas present. Very useful.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine

customer_reviews.title: Great, well-priced gift for co-workers
customer_reviews.text: Great, well-priced gift for co-workers. Packaged decently. A bit smaller than a credit card but easily for in a wallet or pocket. Nice to have as a backup of you don't have tools readily available.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Dull the knife edge and it's fine
customer_reviews.text: I took a file to the knife edge because it was kind of pointless and just made taking it out of my wallet a hassle. The knife edge also makes using the saw blade kind of scary, so if you intend to carry this outside of its flimsy leather sheathe and just in your wallet, I recommend you do the same. Just carry a pocket knife alongside this and it works fine. It takes up so little space that even if I rarely ever use it, there's no real reason not to have it in my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Davis Hadley

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Great for emergencies. Or when you have no power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An handy tool to carry with you
customer_reviews.text: I've only used a few of these features so far, but even if all you ever use is the knife for tearing open packing tape, it's still worth the cost. :) Plus, you never know when this could be lifesaving.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Keelor

customer_reviews.title: The tool itself is pretty cool and fits in a wallet
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself is pretty cool and fits in a wallet. The "leather" carrying case is horrible, melted, curled, cheap-looking plastic, but if you just throw that away immediately, you end up with something that is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Canescent

customer_reviews.title: Very handy, thin and works well.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one I had to throw away when I visited the Statue of Liberty. I take it (almost) everywhere! Very handy!
customer_reviews.author: Dale E. Lear

customer_reviews.title: How can I return it?
customer_reviews.text: There's a whole lot of profit in the $5 that goes into this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Secor Heating and Air Conditioning LLC

customer_reviews.title: Survival T
customer_reviews.text: Used as a gift; have no idea if it works
customer_reviews.author: Lynne Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great,handy tool that fits in credit card space. Caution around children,this is sharp. Love it for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Molli Sowell

customer_reviews.title: Great multi tool!
customer_reviews.text: This is a useful tool to have. This is a sturdy little multi tool that provides a lot of functions in a small and inexpensive package. The only trade off in my opinion is that it’s not really as thin is I thought it would be, but it’s understandable maybe if it were slimmer it would be more proned to bending. All in all, this is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jer_dizon

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described and shown here. A handy tool to keep in car or when traveling. Happy with it. Seems sturdy and should hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Bron

customer_reviews.title: I knew I'd love this before I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: I knew I'd love this before I purchased it. A friend of mine showed me one of these before I ordered mine. It's really amazing what one small tool can do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly high quality, and almost kept it my self.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift add-on for a friend, and almost wished I kept it myself. Thing is really well made and thicker than you'd think, yet still would fit in a wallet. Really functional item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Walter, CFP

customer_reviews.title: Not credit card sized
customer_reviews.text: Not credit card sized. Its smaller than a credit card so if you stack your cards and cash with a band, this won't work well on the outside as one of the metal plates for the band to keep everything inside.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Carson B. Calderwood

customer_reviews.title: Great gift Idea for teens.
customer_reviews.text: Ok... my son has now taken to collecting these "credit card" tools. As first we thought, what a waste of money...these are silly, but, they actually work. They are a really good gift idea for teenage boys (yes girls may like them, just not mine)
customer_reviews.author: doc mom

customer_reviews.title: Based on picture and price
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was a 3pack . It is a single unit. Disappointed. The tool itself is adequate and fairly sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful product. Super sturdy and extremely worth the 10/10 recommend to everybody
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea! The quality didn’t seem as eye catching as others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Raina H.

customer_reviews.title: Caution with edges.
customer_reviews.text: Great little tool. Almost cut myself getting it out. Also the little pouch for it is almost form fitted around it. It is noticeably sunken in. It may be a little smaller than a credit card. Durable little thing.
customer_reviews.author: S+T

customer_reviews.title: Nice gadget
customer_reviews.text: Very nice gadget for Christmas. Few dollars for something extremely nice.
customer_reviews.author: Giovanni Pane

customer_reviews.title: Fits wallet
customer_reviews.text: Handy little multi function tool. Got it for my son, fits perfectly in his wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Mjce

customer_reviews.title: Not credit card sized.
customer_reviews.text: Well, it is smaller than a credit card. About 2/3rds. But it seems quite rigid and the blade parts are sharp. Probably will come in handy in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: GregoryDearth

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it. It was smaller than I expected but it will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: unsafe package but cute tool.
customer_reviews.text: Was sent to me in a letter envelope? Strange. Cute. Durable. Smaller than a credit card. Might be difficult to use saw if u have bigger hands. But small enough for tighter fixes. Overall great for price. Just needs to be packaged in bubble wrap. There are 2 different blades after all..
customer_reviews.author: Hayli sienTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I've actually used this more than I thought. It definitely comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel

customer_reviews.title: but was easily sharpened. Awkward to use as a knife
customer_reviews.text: The knife edge isn't very sharp, but was easily sharpened. Awkward to use as a knife, but better than nothing when you have people searching your bag.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyComputerCat

customer_reviews.title: Practical
customer_reviews.text: This is a good "just in case" tool you can tuck away in your wallet, backpack, or glove box. Sturdy enough for repeated use. Very affordable too
customer_reviews.author: Brianna M

customer_reviews.title: Quick gift
customer_reviews.text: This product is going to make fantastic little gifts for the guys I know. Quick shipping was a plus to get a head of the holiday curve
customer_reviews.author: A.Tavenner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect stocking stuffer for a survivalist boyfriend. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Kallie Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected but it works great and is very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent B.

customer_reviews.title: Works great but the design is slightly flawed because of how ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great but the design is slightly flawed because of how easy it is to cut yourself on the knife corner when reaching in your wallet or when using the tool.
customer_reviews.author: Zach Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love it !!!
customer_reviews.text: I keep it in my wallet - all the time.
customer_reviews.author: ghostdiving

customer_reviews.title: Little smaller than expected but it fits great in wallet
customer_reviews.text: Little smaller than expected but it fits great in wallet. Comes with a little protective sheath so it doesn’t cut up your wallet
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Multi-tool for your wallet
customer_reviews.text: Fits in wallet. Well made for the price. I would highly recommend. It definitely comes in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Alphonse

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got these for boys stocking stuffers they come in handy
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Valadez

customer_reviews.title: Solid Little Tool
customer_reviews.text: A well made little tool. Does what it claims and a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: SJRD

customer_reviews.title: Cool men's gift
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. A little smaller than a credit card which is the size I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha Warwick

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Works well and fits well in my minimalist wallet. My only disappointment was to find the same product in a brick and mortar store (less than a week later) for only a dollar.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Homemaker

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband, since he lost his last one. Good quality and handy tool to keep in his wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but it's cheaper at other places.
customer_reviews.text: I overpaid by a few dollars, but other than that the product is great.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Cisneros

customer_reviews.title: Great Product for the price
customer_reviews.text: just as ordered. Love the inexpensive price. Ive seen lots of these for a lot more money. I lost my last one at the airport. I always have one of these available.
customer_reviews.author: OSHAman

customer_reviews.title: Made a great stocking stuffer
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these. One for my boyfriends Christmas stocking and one for his father. Both thought it was a neat little tool. It is heavy and not cheap. Very happy with this little stocking stuffer gift.
customer_reviews.author: LRogan

customer_reviews.title: Black case poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The tool itself seems to be in good condition, but the leather case it comes in looks horrible. Looks like it had been soaked in water and dried again. It’s very wavy and looks bad. Gave it to by brother in law as a gift and it was a little embarrassing when he asked how long I’ve been using it before I decided to gift it to him...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super handy!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband LOVES this!! He tries to find uses for it haha comes in handy all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Frost

customer_reviews.title: Great stocking stuffers
customer_reviews.text: I passed these out at work for stocking stuffers. Coworkers loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Poulette

customer_reviews.title: Solid tool, bad case
customer_reviews.text: The saw and knife are very sharp and the whole thing is solid and well constructed. The little leather case though is not
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

product_meta.title: SE 11-Function Stainless Steel Survival Pocket Tool - MT908-1
product_meta.description:
With so much functionality in one pocket-sized device, this SE MT908-1 11-Function Stainless Steel Survival Pocket Tool can be used anytime, anywhere—while biking, camping, hiking, at home, school, work, and with all sorts of activities and situations. For your convenience, simply attach this tool onto a jump/key/split ring, lanyard, etc. by using the small keychain hole (located in the corner), or you can take advantage of its credit card size and keep this tool inside your pocket, wallet, emergency/survival kit, and wherever you may need it!

The 11 Functions:
-Can opener
-Bottle cap opener
-4-position wrench
-2-position wrench
-Butterfly screw wrench
-Direction ancillary wrench
-Screwdriver
-Knife edge
-Saw blade
-Ruler
-Keychain hole

Other features of this product:
-Dimensions: 2-¾” x ⅛” x 1-¾”
-Stainless steel material
-Fitted leatherette carrying case (3-⅛” x 2-¾”)

Important:
Avoid getting counterfeit items. Genuine SE products come with our SE logo on the packaging.

SE is committed to providing the customer with the best source for value possible on the market. You will enjoy the quality, function, and usefulness our 11-Function Survival Pocket Tool has to offer.

SE is a registered trademark protected by US Trademark Law.
feature_bullets: Credit card-sized (easily fits inside your wallet, pocket, etc.)
Comes in a black fitted leatherette carrying case
11 Functions include the following: Can opener / Bottle cap opener /
4-Position wrench / 2-Position wrench / Butterfly screw wrench / Direction ancillary wrench /
Knife edge / Saw blade / Screwdriver / Ruler / Keychain hole (for easy attachment onto your gear)
